document.full_text: skyrocketing fuel costs and disasters in japan took a bite of out major u.s. airline earnings reported on thursday, but higher fares helped the carriers, including united continental holdings , meet or beat wall street forecasts.
document.title: airlines results hit by soaring fuel costs
lines_and_colors: skyrocketing fuel costs and disasters in japan took a bite of out major u.s. airline earnings reported on thursday, but higher fares helped the carriers, including united continental holdings , meet or beat wall street forecasts.
